name: Jeff
greetingText: ''Is it just me or does your hair look better than yesterday'' -Jeff
wishText: (っ ͡⚈ ₒ ͡⚈)っ🎔 Joe here just gave you a free coupon to play online with any Leo you like! ;)
text1: It's your birthday, in the case you don't know!!! :D
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah blah a not so funny joke blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something special, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, alles guddes fir däin Gebuertsdag.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
